website_summaries.verdict: Exceptional durability and weather-proof construction in a pole that's easy to use and comes with an excellent guarantee.
pros: Telescoping pole is easy to set up, use, and adjust
Strong pole can withstand various weather conditions
Backed by a 100 percent customer satisfaction guarantee
cons: Although the locking system works better than most, it occasionally slips or needs tightening

customer_reviews.title: Patriotic Feeling
customer_reviews.text: After shopping on line for a flag pole, came across this telescoping flag pole, ratings were decent and after further review of myself, I made the decision to purchase. Item came as stated and packaged nicely, flag is ready to display and the ease of raising and lowering the pole is easy. The installation is a breeze as well. Dig a hole as mentioned sink the PVC base and allow quick cement to set and done, within a few hours I was once again displaying "Old Glory!" If seeking a simple and elegant flag pole , this is the one ! I do recommend purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It came a few days later then said. This was really easy to install and use. Nice and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jay W.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Loved it all and my C,B round the pole I'll be getting some flowers putting in around the rocks
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Vaughn I hasn't received any of item and that why I'm  cancel this order it been to  longer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice flagpole!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very nicely and great design. I love that there are no ropes to deal with. It just telescopes up or down and each section locks in place with a 1/4 twist. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: HOMESAVER

customer_reviews.title: Depth of hole to dig, everything else is easy
customer_reviews.text: I made a base for mine, but you do not have to do all this. Just a nice hole about 19 inches. The sleeve goes in and the pole goes inside of it.. Really easy very strong and sturdy. Very impressed and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I fly a couple of double sided flags from the hitch on my truck at car shows. It’s an easy setup and very sturdy. Today, we were hit by a sudden cold front with steady 30 mph winds, gusting to 45. Heavy rain and hail, too. The pole curved a little, but came through unscathed. I’m very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Edited review 9/10/19 the company saw the review and sent a new pole with clips. We very much appreciated that. The first pole would slip when the wind blows. A breeze in the area we live is 15 mph. So when we have windy days of 25 mph the pole continues to slip. The rings do hold better than the first pole but with the shaking in the wind they still come loose. If you live in a less windy area you will love this pole. Thank you to the company for the exchange. Husband had modified the pole and it is staying up
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Machin

customer_reviews.title: Red,White, & Blue 24/7
customer_reviews.text: There were or are no dislikes. Really happy with item. As a Infantry US Army Veteran very proud to fly the colors !! Hope they dont fade fast like my others have.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Updegraff

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two flag poles - one for home and one for beach...along with the solar light topper. I like the fact that the pole is telescopic and can be lowered and removed for inclement weather conditions. The only downside - plastic parts (flag clips, cleats and ball topper...Not sure how they will hold up long-term, but not a problem to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Tish Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great for tailgating.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for tailgating and it has worked out great so far. I’ve had it up about 10 times and no issues as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the yard
customer_reviews.text: This came as advertised and on the day they said it would. I put this up the day I got it. Rather than an 18” hole with sand that the directions called for, I used concrete to set the sleeve in a 9” diameter hole. I also put a 5” stainless carriage bolt at the bottom of the sleeve so the flag pole does not set directly on the ground. Very sturdy flying two nylon flags, each 3x5. The telescoping sections slide easily and lock into place and hold secure. I also purchased a solar light separately so I can fly the flags at night. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: TSnider

customer_reviews.title: Love this Flag Pole
customer_reviews.text: Great Value! VERY STURDY! Used every weekend at Texas Renaissance Festival and withstood the high winds in the camp grounds. Love the height flexibility with the extensions. The height also made it easy to see. Highly recommend this product. The only assembly was screwing the ball on top.
customer_reviews.author: wconstott

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when it's not tapped around the pole.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was not difficult to put up. The only thing I didn't like is that there is times when the flag rap around the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product with a little flaw but still worth purchasing IMO
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m pretty satisfied with this flag pole. Looks great and my neighbors love it too. I have two issues that kept my rating down a little. First is the fact that from time to time a couple of the sections have slid down into each other’s no matter how many times I turn it it never seems to tighten enough and the second is the pole is not real sturdy and has a tendency to sway pretty good on windy days. The not tightening enough is a bit frustrating. Would like to know if there’s a way to correct that. I would still recommend this product because is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay upright.. Broke after a few days of being upBeware
customer_reviews.text: The pole on a daily basis does not stay upright.. Everyday I have to go out and re tighten the pole and raise it back up.. With the good reviews of this pole I would expect better.. I do not recommend this pole.. Update the plastic sleeve that holds the pole upright has broken and the pole will not stay up at all now.. Waste of money..
customer_reviews.author: Billy Hogwood

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Customer Service has responded
customer_reviews.text: [Update 10/16/19] The company did eventually respond to me, and has indicated that they will send a replacement pole. Two stars added for standing behind the product. I was very pleased with this flagpole until a 10-minute storm snapped it like a toothpick! Customer Service has not replied to my email after 48+ hours (despite claims that they will always do so within 24), so as of now, I can’t recommend the product. I’ll f they respond adequately, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last Long
customer_reviews.text: I received this pole and found in very easy to install. For a month it was great. During the second month it began to loosen and lower itself 2 to three lengths. I would have to go out and raise it and tighten it again. That was OK in the beginning because it is not hard to do. However, one length no longer tightens so my 25 foot pole is now only 20 feet. Most disappointing is that I emailed the seller and asked if there was a way to fix it....no response. Do not buy this pole.
customer_reviews.author: David Srein

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: The product was packaged well and looked good. It did not come with any instructions or information and was unable to find any online. After installing and flying the supplied flag for 24 hours the pole sections kept coming loose and collapsing no matter how tight I hand tightened them. Also the flag started to tatter. If it continues to collapse I am going to drill holes above the fittings and install removable pins. Probably will have to buy a new flag soon as well.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: This pole was exactly what we were looking for, purchased in October and we installed in December. We hung a 3X5 flag on it and cemented into the ground, the top portion broke off in May on a somewhat windy day. I contacted the company and asked about their warranty and was told i can pay $30 shipping for a replacement or get a $15 credit. I wouldn't recommend this product because of the garbage return policy & product quality.
customer_reviews.author: jessica gioia

customer_reviews.title: Very timely delivery.  The unit works like a s described.
customer_reviews.text: The so called "free" flag is a cheap China knockoff. Buy your own and use it instead. Otherwise the unit worked just fine. Installation was easy if you own an level and can dig a hole. We used a bag of Quikset and installed in about two hours including dry time. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sailaway02

customer_reviews.title: You're gonna need to do some diggin
customer_reviews.text: I beleive this to be a well designed product and an affordable option for residential or commercial use. Digging the hole for the base was a bit of a chore (I'm fiddy-seven yrs old tho). the 16' depth required is alot deeper than you would think. I suggest a pick-ax as the tool. I dug out a 6" wide ring for the cement and used the earth for the form. If I could have located a 24" dia cylinder, I would have just dug out a 30" dia hole & used that. The sand filled base hole allows the pole some flexibility for windy day & should work to prevent the pole from snapping. I reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good flag pole.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put up, hardest part was digging the hole. very happy with this kind of pole, the section locking device works very well. when fully extended (20') with a summer breeze seemed to be a lot of pole movement, like someone was waving the flag. So we let it down one section and we like it. lastly the flag that comes with it looks more like a hankie. very thin. So I would recommend getting your own flag. The other question I saw was will it take a larger flag and it will. This takes 2 flags, so flying at half staff is possible just move the flag down to the second flagg position.
customer_reviews.author: Ben F. Linduff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but I do question the sturdiness of the tele sections?
customer_reviews.text: The individual pole sections appear to be very sturdy and comes with a nice American flag w/fastener clips. However; I installed the pole in concrete a week ago and have had to re-extend one of the tele portions about 10 times now because it keeps collapsing down. The image I posted actually shows the last section being collapsed. If it continues to do this I'll have to rework it which is fine, but does defeat the purpose of being able to tele it to hang or remove a flag. I would otherwise give the product a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, bad execution
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s flag pole. And the idea is Fantastic. The telescoping thought has potential. BUT the locking mechanism or lack there of causes you to come home after 12+ mph winds to find that you have a pole with an erection problem, and the flags are on the ground. My pole is mounted in the shipped sleeve that’s buried 18 inches in the ground, with about 180lbs of concrete pour around it. So the base is sturdy. Unfortunately the pole flops all over the place like a dying fish in low winds due to the thinness of the metal... So in time I’m sure I’ll come home and find the pole has snapped. I’d that happens I’ll update this
customer_reviews.author: Dave Pointer

customer_reviews.title: Flag pole will not stay extended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my veteran husband for Christmas. He wanted to replace the flag pole attached to the house with one inground to proudly display our flag in the center of our yard. He loved the new flag pole, it was easy to install. Only problem (ongoing problem) is it will not stay extended for more than two or three days. It's been 4 months of having to go out to re extend the flag. Either we have a 'faulty' pole or this is something to expect with this type of flag pole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survived a huge wind storm
customer_reviews.text: We live in the desert. It's normally very dry but monsoon storms appear out of nowhere. Yesterday a huge storm came through with 60MPH winds. I have 2 flags on the pole. The winds were too strong to attempt to take the flags down so I had no choice but to let the flags fly. The flag pole came through with flying colors (no pun intended). I didn't think it would survive but was quite amazed at how well it did.
customer_reviews.author: Bullhead Bart

customer_reviews.title: A Disgrace! To United States of America flag!
customer_reviews.text: My Veteran husband and I were preparing the flag sent with the pole for the installers coming tomorrow. To our horror, sadness, and disgust we saw the flag. The material is see through, the red stripes are more of a strange color of orange red, and it had two stains at the bottom, center of the flag. To add insult to injury, the flag has a “ Made In China” tag on it. I would never recommend anyone buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much perfect
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this flag pole kit. I'm a 67-year-old crabby female retiree, and I was able to do it all myself. Granted, the post hole diggers are not my best friends, nor is hauling a 50 pound bag of Quikrete, but once that part was done, the rest was smooth sailing. The flag looks awesome in my yard, seems sturdy, and I love the look. Hint: buy the solar light for the top of the pole. It's dynamite at night.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: More than you would expect in the price range.
customer_reviews.text: When ordering anything online to be shipped, good packaging is essential. This company goes above and beyond when it comes to ensuring your flag pole arrives in optimum shape. The pole itself is very sturdy and the sleeve is precisely the right size with no wobble. The finial has a long shaft which allows for an easy fit with most solar powered flag lights. The only suggestion I would make to the manufacturer, would be to include a small 3"-4" level to help with installation of the sleeve in concrete prior to setting the pole itself.
customer_reviews.author: MattPC

customer_reviews.title: You'll need to modify the plastic sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Flag pole is built great works as described ( maybe even better than described). Only improvement that's needed is the plastic sleeve that is provided to slide the aluminum pole into tends to move around and even pull out with the pole. I have to drill a steel bar horizontally at the very bottom of the plastic sleeve so it would stay in place. Otherwise than that great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flagpole
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice flagpole but I'm having issues. One section keeps sliding down and no matter how hard I try to tighten it, it slides down. The pole fits in the sleeve loose so the pole wobbles a little in the wind but not bad. If it keeps sliding down, I'll have to put a bolt in it and then so much for the telescoping feature. I think I would try another vendor if I need to replace this one. Flag that comes with pole is crap. Had to purchase a nice outdoor flag for $25.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay extended
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but needs a lot more developing to be a good pole. Within one hour of setting the pole the top section had collapsed. By the 4th hour all sections had collapsed down to the totally extended height. Fully extended a second time with same results. I'm returning this one and it's back to researching this product for a better quality flag pole.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Returned but the manufacturer sent me another flag.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't opened the new flag, but the manufacturer sent me a new flag, since my review was so bad when I received the first flag. This is great customer service. I had to return the first one. Once I put the new one up, I'll take a picture and post it here. I give the "5" for customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We just put up this flag pole last week but we've already had severe thunderstorms and it's held up well. It's definitely more sturdy than the last pole we had. It looks beautiful as well. The flag looks screen printed and cheap though, so we did purchase a higher quality flag. So far, I would recommend this flag pole.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L

customer_reviews.title: The sleeves of the pole keep slipping, sometimes go out 4 times a day to slide up again
customer_reviews.text: The pole is excellent and the way it goes together is easy. The major problem is that the telescoping sleeves will not stay up without slipping. In wind it's terrible. This is my 2nd pole, (sent the first one back because of this problem) and now I am having the same problem with the second one. Something is not right with the locking system. I got no instructions or troubleshooting information with this flag.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pole, Issue with Couplings
customer_reviews.text: The pole has been up for six months now and it seems to be quite sturdy, surviving several wind storms. However I deducted a star because the joints no longer unscrew so that the flag can be lowered and changed. Each time I need to change the flag out, I have to pull the pole out of the PVC base and lay the pole down to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Labiosa

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as thought from description
customer_reviews.text: Pole is more delicate than we thought. If a strong wind comes, we may have to take it down. Free flag is very thin - actually see through and only bright color on one side! We purchased a good USA made American Flag, but husband is afraid it is too heavy for pole, which is China made.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A Maerz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! JUNK cheap flag made in China!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this, poles don't stay locked. Dosent matter how hard you twist them. They loosen up and the flag drops. Happened several times the first day it was up. Promptly returned.
customer_reviews.author: BRET WATKINS

customer_reviews.title: Help with extending
customer_reviews.text: We are having trouble getting flag pole to stay at full height. No matter how hard we tighten each section, it will drop one or two sections relatively soon after putting it upright. We have received really good support regarding our issue. The company is going to send us a replacement pole and we are very pleased with their response.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne C

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but needs a better system to keep the pole ip.
customer_reviews.text: This pole will not stay up. No matter how much you tighten it the internal shaft cam locks loosen and it slides back down. I had to drill holes at the base of each section to insert a clevis pin to keep it up. But I’m sure it’ll only be a short matter of time before the thin aluminum no longer holds the pins either.
customer_reviews.author: picksix

customer_reviews.title: flagpole
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, promptly delivered, the ball for the top was cracked, contacted shipper and they send a new one out, no questions. Have had it up a month or so now and has withstood winds in excess of 50 mph so far. The flag is doing great. I would recommend the pole to everone.
customer_reviews.author: michael l harrison

customer_reviews.title: I probably wouldn't recommend this flag pole or company.
customer_reviews.text: On our second flag pole. First one after two weeks started slipping every day flag was lower to the ground. Lower section would not stay locked. I sent e-mail to company they blew me off. Said since I ordered from Amazon had to go through them. So I did got another one, verdict is still out on this one only had two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy ever
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to install, Easy to bring down to change flag. Love the no problem with flag winding up in wind. This is an absolutely great buy. Can’t rave enough about it. I’m going to order solar light that mounts at top of flag pole. I should have bought at same time.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping Joints
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to tighten and loosen the telescoping joints 5-6 times as tight as you can by hand. This helps "Seat" or "Break In" the tension joints so when it gets windy, they don't come loose. Do this with each section fully extended.
customer_reviews.author: Kent C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great flag pole
customer_reviews.text: I love this flag pole! Finally a way for me to change out the flags. For the first few days we had it it kept falling, then after about the third day I was able to tighten it and it has not fell sense and it’s been a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: USA FLAG FLYS ABOVE ALL
customer_reviews.text: Firstly please remember that the USA flag is to fly ABOVE any other flag, you’d think someone in Cowboys Country would know that. That being said this pole is great to install and the packaging was perfect for shipping undamaged. Stands plenty tall. You can remove the lower flag and place the USA flag there to fly at half mast. The only issue is the flag that comes with it was made in China. I personally can’t fly an American flag made in China. That’s just me. Not racist! Haha just American.
customer_reviews.author: jesse sailler

customer_reviews.title: Flagpole and flag
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and extends beautifully. As a surviving spose of a Viet Nam Vet, I have always displayed a flag in my front yard. after a severe storm came through this area and destroyed my flagpole I decided to order a better one. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Burton

customer_reviews.title: no made in china flags, especially AMERICAN
customer_reviews.text: Totally pissed me off to find an American flag inside the box MADE IN CHINA! not surprising that the pole is made in china... better to not put ANY flag in the box, as one made in china. Flag went into the burn pileno made in china
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Chick

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the agravation
customer_reviews.text: Top part did not lock very well. When raised, it kept sliding down. Spent about an hour trying to lock real tight but down it came. Will never buy a telescopic flag pole again. Will go with stationary one.
customer_reviews.author: dominic robertazzi

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both veterans and wanted a much more permanent way to display the flag. This pole is great. We got a solar powered light for the top. We display the American flag and the MIA/POW flag all day every day!
customer_reviews.author: jenn1980

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping parts of the pole do not remain extended. Must be re extended each day.
customer_reviews.text: The pole retracts and sides down to the first level. Instructions suggest it should be hand tightened. Doing this does not last for more than a few hours. Each section of the telescoping pole must be secured to prevent this. Either by drilling holes and adding bolts and nuts or duct taping each extension. Also, the plastic rings that hold the clips to attach the flag move. The bottom ring needs to be secured or the bottom of the flag will rise to the top of the pole and the rings will meet. The PVC sleeve the pole rests in is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed in Pa.

customer_reviews.title: slides down if you don't twist it tight
customer_reviews.text: its hard to twist each section so it will stay up all the way. specially with my small hands. my hubby can do it better but it still slips down on him. wish it was a click and stick type
customer_reviews.author: K. A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flag pole!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Looks so great. I have a light on it so I’ve only taken the flags down a couple of times. I have use gloves to get enough grip to twist the sections to loosen them. Only one time I pulled a section completely out but that was because I turned it way too much when loosening the sections. Overall I’m thrilled with this! If you’re interested in putting your flag up every day and taking it down every evening you may want to get a pole with ropes.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This flagpole looks great but it has to be tightened after installing it. I have had to take mine down several times and tighten a section again after the wind blows enough to loosen it.
customer_reviews.author: Eva R Garst

customer_reviews.title: Nice with One Big Flaw
customer_reviews.text: The telescoping pole will not stay up, no matter how tight you tighten the sections. Also the flag doesn't swivel very well. It's a great idea and it looks good, but has some issues.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Slight breeze will bring down a section
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for 2 weeks and then the nightmare began. Every morning we had to put a different section back up. One night we had 40mph wind and it bent like a pretzel. Broke. Only had it for 3 months. Will not buy this one again. And the flag is cheap looking. Thin as paper. Had to buy a better on that is heavier and with more color.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Barboza

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this! It’s terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay up! The pole constantly slides right back into the lowest position.
customer_reviews.author: H Roque

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: The flag pole is very thin and wobbled in the breeze It has twist connection that come undone as the flag is blown in the breeze causing it to telescope back into itself. The enclosed flag is flimsy and was lacking a grommet. Not a way I want to display my American flag
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love the flag pole
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it more stars but like others, for whatever reason as tight as I try to make the sleeves, it slides down at least every few days.. I have the solar light kit on top and it works like a charm.. I'll keep raising it, thats what Patriotic Americans do.. but it does bother me a little when I see it at half height after a day of being at full staff..
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pascuma

customer_reviews.title: Good flag pole
customer_reviews.text: The flag pole is very sturdy and was to assemble. If you follow the instructions you will have no problem with this product. I suggest you purchase another flag.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy, but tough to beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time drilling out centers of all the connecting caps to sturdy it with a 10' piece of water/gas pipe, but the client loves his flagpole.
customer_reviews.author: robert lang

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Will not stand erect closes up, flag screwed after first wind storm
customer_reviews.author: Ernest B.

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 1 use.  Customer service was quick to respond.
customer_reviews.text: The product broke the first time it was used. I will say their customer support was prompt to respond to my issues but due to the poor quality of the product I would not recommend this product for any friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: Travis B

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy pole
customer_reviews.text: Great product and holds up well. I had a fiberglass flag pole for my RV but it kept falling down. No way to lock it in place. The aluminum pole locks at every section. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: D&JElectric

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This flag is easy to install and looks amazing. I've had lots of compliments from my neighbors on how great it looks. One bag on concrete and a good level is all it took.
customer_reviews.author: Termite

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: 2nd section from top doesn't want to stay locked. I come home from work and I have to raise pole back up. No very happy that that flag is often wrapped because it doesn't always swivel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: total garbage
customer_reviews.text: Worked alright the first couple times then started locking up so couldnt raise or lower .Have tried spraying with WD40 ,using channel lock pliers and still not working as said it would -Dont waste your money on this pole
customer_reviews.author: robert miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Pole for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Installed the sleeve with a 60 lb bag of sacrete. Attached the flags and extended it out. ZERO problems with the twist lock slipping. Very nice addition to my front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Joey T.

customer_reviews.title: Love the flag pole!
customer_reviews.text: The flag that came with the pole is not great. One side looks washed out so we bought a better flag with stitched stars and vivid colors.
customer_reviews.author: Dunes Duffer

customer_reviews.title: Show Your Support
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful flag pole. My husband didn't think much of it when he first got it but once he started setting it up he just loves it. Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great pole with broken ball topper
customer_reviews.text: Nice flagpole, easy to install, only issue is the gold ball topper was smashed and broken when delivered. Could I get a replacement ball?
customer_reviews.author: Scharmaine Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy pole.
customer_reviews.text: This pole seems to be pretty sturdy and the light is really bright. I also like that is folds down like a telescope so i could easily replace the flags.
customer_reviews.author: Pango

customer_reviews.title: Flag winds around the pole
customer_reviews.text: The flag keep getting woud around the pole because the flag hanging clips do not rotate with the flag when the wind changes direction. Any suggestions from the manufacturer?
customer_reviews.author: nyjints86

customer_reviews.title: Made in China!
customer_reviews.text: MADE IN CHINA! I read one of the questions about the flag pole asking if it was made in the USA. It said it was. How does one hang an American flag from a made in China flag pole? Ugh! Sways in the wind a bit but I’m not worried about it. It’s the right height and was a cinch to install over the top of our existing flag pole base.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT ADDITION TO OUR FRONT YARD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flag pole and solar light for my son’s new home. I was extremely skeptical because the price was very affordable. Glad we made this purchase. FABULOUS addition to my son’s new front yard. Great night light as well.....
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping appears good.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t installed yet. Ground is frozen. It seems sturdy. 4/6/2020. Today is first day my husband able to install flag pole (MN frozen ground) which he I gave as birthday gift Jan. 2020. Appears good.
customer_reviews.author: Dorene

customer_reviews.title: Flag Pole
customer_reviews.text: Put the flag pole up and it looks amazing. Can’t say how study it is since it’s only been up for a couple of days. I did upgrade the flag.
customer_reviews.author: Cyd

customer_reviews.title: Display your flag
customer_reviews.text: THe "free" flag is so cheap. Buy a real flag if you make this purchase. The pole seems sturdy, the flag clips are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: grammalynn

customer_reviews.title: okay quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had sturdier flagpoles. Flags do tangle. Not supposed to tangle. When you tighten poles, they dont always stop turning. Not a great design.
customer_reviews.author: michelle grillone

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but...see review.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but we didn’t get all our parts. The add showed 2 flags, we got only one. Also the connectors that connect the flag to the pole we’re missing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Do t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Work good for a while till the return window closed.. Now the top sleeve won't tighten Won't buy again . Junk
customer_reviews.author: FISHEY

customer_reviews.title: Super solid Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with how study this was! Great quality and probably the best packing i have seen for large item. The installations is super easy. USE A BIG LEVEL!
customer_reviews.author: thedefchef

customer_reviews.title: Flagpole
customer_reviews.text: The pole doesnt want to stay telescoped keeps sliding down! pole bends in the wind. Comes with a very lightweight flag. I used my heavier one maybe that is why it looks like it bends.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Leaning pole
customer_reviews.text: Where the pole slides into the sleeve is sloppy making it lean have to Shem it to get it straight up and down ! Flag is cheap and clearly says made in China whitch I thought was odd since it's a American Flag I bought a Made in the USA Flag to go with my leaning flag pole spend the money and get a better one !
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: this is a really nice flag pole. Holding up good so far. The flag they send is really cheap. Its purple white and blue.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM BUTERA

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The only aspect of this product that comes close to it's quality is their customer service. Outstanding product and even better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Grant

customer_reviews.title: Trump 2020 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: The instructions has you cement it into the ground. I took an Auger drill bit, 3” diameter and bored a hole 20” deep. I hammered the sleeve down into the hole and pack dirt down the outer side of the sleeve. This allows me to pull up the sleeve and move it if I want to change Locations.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Vest

customer_reviews.title: Neighbor Support
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at my neighbors that have stopped and thanked me for putting up the flag.
customer_reviews.author: Roy V. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, make sure you wear gloves to
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks nice. With it being telescopic it doesn’t always stay fully assembled as sometimes I wake up and the flag pole is considerably lower. Make sure you wear gloves and really tighten the poles to help with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a 50/50 like and dislike-At a distance it looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Bottom the flagpole was OK. You get what you pay for $100 especially when it’s coming from China. The brass ball on the top was super super cheap plastic and the flag was thin and stained. I love the look of the flag flying in my backyard but the quality of this is so so. I won’t even hang the flag. poor quality. I bought a nicer one.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE The Superfood Truck

customer_reviews.title: Flag pole
customer_reviews.text: Plastic flag holders don't turn with wind direction that easy. Had both flags rap around pole. Shipping was questionable. Never updated on amazon. Will see about quality, only been up a week.
customer_reviews.author: Panhead

customer_reviews.title: Love the pole
customer_reviews.text: Very good flag pole but unless you have very strong hands, you will need vise grips to help in tighten sections.
customer_reviews.author: T. Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Nice flag pole
customer_reviews.text: Nice flag pole, complements by my neighbors! My previous flag pole was a push pin- type telescoping, seemed slightly more sturdy. I really had to twist these sections tight to prevent them from loosening and the pole shortening in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: jhovatter

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy flagpole
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flag pole. Has gone through a tropical storm with flag attached and still like new.
customer_reviews.author: James kinder

customer_reviews.title: Wasted quality flag
customer_reviews.text: My bad did not pay attention others say made in USA made in China toilet thin flag
customer_reviews.author: Costas

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We love the flag and flag pole it was just right for our yard! The only problem we had was the bottom section didn't want to catch but it was an easy fix with a small rod. Seller got it to us quickly. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ch270e Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy flagpole
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Bought it for a birthday gift for my husband. Excellent product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sunni A. Ziroff

customer_reviews.title: Looks great , especially with  solar light on top.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to use ,but will some times telescope in.
customer_reviews.author: Bob. H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Occasionally One of the sections will slip lowering the height of the flag. It is very easy to readjust and not a problem. The flag looks kind of faded and I might buy another that is full colored but it looks nice and I am proud of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W Keigley

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: A real nice pole worth the money. Very nice quality very strong can handle 2 flags
customer_reviews.author: William

product_meta.title: WeValor 20FT Telescoping Flag Pole Kit, Heavy Duty 16 Gauge Aluminum Outdoor In Ground Flag Poles with 3x5 USA Flag, for Residential or Commercial, Silver
product_meta.description:
Wevalor Extra Thick Heavy Duty 20 Foot Telescoping FlagPole Set

Show your pride and use the Wevalor telescopic flagpole to raise the flag. This 16-gauge aluminum flagpole is durable, rust-proof . It can be extended to 20 feet long. The telescopic design makes it easy to change the flag.

Specifications:
Import Designation: Imported
Color: Silver
Dimensions: 20FT
Material: Aluminum
Wall Thickness: 1.2mm
American National Flag Size: 3 "x 5"
American National Flag Material:100% polyester
5 Sections Telescopic Flagpole Diameter: 2.17", 2.01",1.81",1.65",1.5"

Package Content:
1x Flag Pole
1x Gold Ball Topper
1x American National Flag
4x stainless steel clips
1x PVC Sleeve
1x Instruction

If the flagpole cannot be locked, we recommend that you wear leather gloves and follow the directions to tighten it.100% Customer Satisfaction: 
All Wevalor products provide 1-year quality assurance and pursue 100% customer satisfaction. If you have any problems with your flagpole, please contact us , our customer staff will resolve it for you within 24 hours.
feature_bullets: Upgrade locking system: We continuously draw on customer suggestions, improve the locking system, add elastic fasteners at each joint to avoid pole collapse, and at the same time ensure easy unlocking

Free 3x5 American Flag: Inground flagpoles are wind and rust proof, can withstand the all-weather outdoor environment, strong enough to support two flags, and a 3x5 Polyester American flag will be given as a gift

Easy to install and store: The telescopic flag pole can be easily installed in a few minutes, with a twist-lock design ((no ropes or pulleys) to avoid the rope from hitting in the breeze, the top rotating shaft avoid the flag from tangling
Standard accessories: 100% polyester 3x5 American flag, gold ball ornament, 4 stainless steel clips，heavy duty PVC sleeve and user guide
100% Customer Satisfaction: All Wevalor products provide 1-year quality assurance and pursue 100% customer satisfaction. If you have any questions, please contact us
